about_the_game:
Welcome to the Dungeon is a 2D simulation game that combines puzzles and strategy RPG elements, inspired by board games. Players design dungeons creatively to optimize hero development, offering a unique problem-solving experience.

With retro-style pixel art graphics, Welcome to the Dungeon delivers a nostalgic vibe reminiscent of classic games, alongside the intense strategy and puzzle-solving elements of board games, creating a distinct sense of enjoyment.

Plan and observe how heroes navigate through the creative dungeons you build. Help them grow as much and as quickly as possible to achieve your goals.

Design a Hero's Dungeon Exploration

In the dungeon, heroes will progress non-stop—defeating monsters, looting treasure chests, receiving blessings, buying items, avoiding traps, activating levers, and drinking potions.
Players can set the frequency, order, and placement of these events simply by dragging and placing objects from their inventory.

Fill your dungeon using an intuitive, board game-like system, where designing is as easy as moving game pieces.

The Dilemma Between Growth and Placement

To help your hero grow, you need to set up battles with more enemies and stronger foes. However, the faster they grow, the higher the risk of failure.
Strategically place objects that allow the hero to recover between battles, avoid tough opponents, or take on weaker enemies first and save the strongest ones for critical moments.

Overcome dilemmas with creative solutions and successfully achieve your hero’s growth goals.

Changing Hero Appearance Based on Growth

What kind of hero your Lv.1 character becomes is entirely up to you.

With each level-up, their stats increase according to your distribution choices. Focus on defense or prioritize attack—it's your call.

The hero’s appearance will also change to reflect their growing stats.

Key Features

  • Over 30 dungeon maps to play

  • More than 10 types of objects, with over 100 combinable set objects

  • Unique retro-style graphics and animations

  • Simulation-based dungeon exploration for heroes

  • A wide variety of items for heroes to use

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Place monsters and objects directly on a grid-based dungeon. Watch as heroes travel along the paths, interacting with the objects and events you’ve set up, and see if they grow according to your plan. Train them into stronger heroes and guide them to reach their ultimate destination!
